extension.searchTitle: CLOTURE MOTION; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 79

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate resumed consideration of the nomination of Scott Gottlieb, of Connecticut, to be Commissioner of Food and Drugs, Department of Health and Human Services.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 57 yeas to 41 nays (Vote No. 123), Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.
